alert.note: Alert for Bingham; Bonneville; Butte; Jefferson (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 3:38PM MDT until August 13 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...EAST CENTRAL BUTTE...NORTHWESTERN BONNEVILLE AND NORTHWESTERN BINGHAM COUNTIES... At 338 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Southeast Inl, or 22 miles southwest of Terreton, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Southeast Inl. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
